video_title: Lee Jae Myung Meets Xi Jinping
topic: south korea's lee jae myung seeks 'new phase' in ties with china at xi jinping meeting

text: South Korea's President Lee Jae Myung is set to meet with Chinese President Xi Jinping
to discuss a new phase in ties between the two countries
This meeting is part of Lee's efforts to strengthen diplomatic relations with China
a key trade partner for South Korea
During the meeting, the two leaders are expected to discuss various issues
including trade, security, and regional cooperation
The meeting comes as South Korea seeks to balance its relations with China and the United States
amid growing tensions in the region
The meeting between Lee and Xi is seen as an opportunity for the two countries to enhance their bilateral ties
The meeting is an opportunity for the two countries to discuss various issues
including trade, security, and regional cooperation
to enhance their bilateral ties and cooperation on key issues
The meeting between Lee and Xi is seen as an opportunity for the two countries to enhance their ties
